about_the_game:
Hidden Tomatoes: Farm Frenzy takes you to a lively farm where your mission is to find 100 hidden tomatoes scattered across vibrant fields, barns, and cozy farmhouses. Explore the beautiful rural environment as you uncover hidden tomatoes cleverly tucked away in every corner.

With calming background music and a soothing countryside atmosphere, this game offers a relaxing yet exciting experience for all players.

Gameplay:

🍅 1 Level, 100 hidden tomatoes in a picturesque farm setting.
👉 Click on the tomatoes as you find them.

Features:

  • Wander through lush fields, old barns, and quaint farmhouses in search of hidden treasures.

  • No time limits—take your time to enjoy the peaceful farm life.

  • Fun and challenging for players of all ages.

Can you discover all the hidden tomatoes on the farm? Start your adventure now!

name: Hidden Tomatoes : Farm Frenzy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphical card supporting DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 390 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Find 100 hidden tomatoes in a beautiful and peaceful farm environment with fields, barns, and rustic houses. Enjoy a relaxing, time-free experience with soothing music and a fun challenge for players of all ages.
